price: Wei na Yεde tuaa wͻn ka εfa wͻn boniayε no ho nti, na Yεntwe obi aso, gyesε boniayεfoͻ no.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ جَزَيۡنَٰهُم بِمَا كَفَرُواْۖ وَهَلۡ نُجَٰزِيٓ إِلَّا ٱلۡكَفُورَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: dhālika jazaynāhum bimā kafarū wahal nujāzī illā al-kafūra
